TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A bacterial toxic substance linked to an antibody that attaches to cancer cells and kills them. It belongs to the family of drugs called bacterial immunotoxins.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia tóxica bacteriana ligada a un anticuerpo que se une a las células cancerosas y las destruye. Es un tipo de inmunotoxina bacteriana.
